lead_paragraph: Dr. Alvin F. Poussaint is leaving the Judge Baker Children’s Center in Boston and closing his Media Center, which for 16 years fought harmful media influences on children.
snippet: Dr. Alvin F. Poussaint is leaving the Judge Baker Children’s Center in Boston and closing his Media Center, which for 16 years fought harmful media influences on children.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Psychiatrist Departs After Baby Einstein Controversy
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Psychiatrist Departs After Baby Einstein Controversy
